doc:
José Mojica https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Mojica 0 José Mojica Marins (born March 13, 1936) is a Brazilian filmmaker, actor, composer, screenwriter, and television and media personality. Marins is also known by his alter ego Coffin Joe (loosely translated from Zé do Caixão). Although Marins is known primarily as a horror film director, his earlier works were Westerns, dramas and adventure films. José_Mojica_Marins ( born March_13_,_1936 ) is a_Brazilian_filmmaker , actor , composer , screenwriter , and television_and_media_personality . Marins is_also_known by his_alter_ego_Coffin_Joe (_loosely_translated from Zé do Caixão_) . Although Marins is_known primarily as a_horror_film_director , his_earlier_works were Westerns_,_dramas_and_adventure_films .
